statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_categories @> ARRAY['technology', 'science'];
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_categories @> ARRAY['politics'];
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE recommended_articles->>'category' = 'tech';
SELECT user_id, email, recommended_articles FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM recommended_articles;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM recommended_articles;
SELECT username, email, belief_category FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_category = 'Science';
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM recommended_articles WHERE belief_category = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_category IN ('Science', 'Philosophy');
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_category = 'Science';
SELECT article_title, article_description FROM article_recommendations ORDER BY challenge_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, rating, feedback_comment FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN user_feedback ON user_profiles.user_id = user_feedback.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_category = 'Religion';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_strength > 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, belief_category FROM user_profiles WHERE belief_category IN ('Science', 'Philosophy') AND belief_strength BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY belief_strength ASC;

SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_description, u.username FROM article_recommendations a JOIN user_profiles u ON a.belief_category = u.belief_category WHERE a.challenge_level > 3 ORDER BY a.article_title ASC;

SELECT f.feedback_id, u.username, a.article_title, f.rating, f.feedback_comment FROM user_feedback f JOIN user_profiles u ON f.user_id = u.user_id JOIN article_recommendations a ON f.article_id = a.article_id WHERE f.rating >= 4 ORDER BY f.rating DESC, a.article_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT title, category FROM articles ORDER BY article_id DESC;
SELECT content FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating FROM user_article_history WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'johndoe';
SELECT title, content, category FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY article_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating, timestamp FROM user_article_history WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_at FROM recommended_articles WHERE user_id = 50 AND recommended_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM articles ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, article_id, rating FROM user_article_preferences WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT a.title, bc.category_name FROM articles a JOIN article_belief_mapping abm ON a.article_id = abm.article_id JOIN belief_categories bc ON abm.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE bc.category_name = 'Politics';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT title, published_date FROM articles WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT article_id, content FROM articles WHERE published_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY article_id DESC
SELECT user_id, email, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 18 AND gender='Male'
SELECT a.title, b.category_name FROM articles a INNER JOIN article_belief_mapping abm ON a.article_id = abm.article_id INNER JOIN belief_categories b ON abm.category_id = b.category_id
